mapper.sql: id, order_id, code, physical_unit, entrust_unit, hazard_factors, physical_type, physical_date, physical_number, physical_project, evaluation_basis, concluding_observations, is_show, del_flag, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time, delete_id, delete_time
mapper.select: SELECT hazard_factors_text, work_state_text, physical_type, SUM(CASE WHEN check_result IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total, SUM(CASE WHEN check_result like '%0%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS noAbnormalNum, SUM(CASE WHEN check_result like '%1%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS otherAbnormalNum, SUM(CASE WHEN check_result like '%2%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS tabooNum, SUM(CASE WHEN check_result like '%3%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS diseaseNum, SUM(CASE WHEN check_result like '%4%' or is_recheck = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS recheckNum, SUM(CASE WHEN check_result like '%2%' or check_result like '%3%' or check_result like '%4%' or is_recheck = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS recheckNums, SUM(CASE WHEN is_recheck = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS reviewNum, SUM(CASE WHEN is_recheck != 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS normalNum, SUM(CASE WHEN is_pass > 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS allNum FROM t_group_person WHERE t_group_person.del_flag = 0 AND t_group_person.order_id = #{orderId} AND is_pass >= 2 GROUP BY hazard_factors,work_state_code

SELECT hazard_factors_text, work_state_text, physical_type, SUM(CASE WHEN check_result IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total, SUM(CASE WHEN check_result like '%0%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS noAbnormalNum, SUM(CASE WHEN check_result like '%1%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS otherAbnormalNum, SUM(CASE WHEN check_result like '%2%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS tabooNum, SUM(CASE WHEN check_result like '%3%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS diseaseNum, SUM(CASE WHEN check_result like '%4%' or is_recheck = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS recheckNum, SUM(CASE WHEN check_result like '%2%' or check_result like '%3%' or check_result like '%4%' or is_recheck = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS recheckNums, SUM(CASE WHEN is_recheck = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS reviewNum, SUM(CASE WHEN is_recheck != 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS normalNum, SUM(CASE WHEN is_pass > 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS allNum FROM t_group_person WHERE t_group_person.del_flag = 0 AND t_group_person.order_id = #{orderId} AND is_pass > 3 GROUP BY hazard_factors,work_state_code
SELECT t_unit_report.* FROM t_unit_report WHERE t_unit_report.order_id = #{orderId} AND t_unit_report.del_flag = 0 GROUP BY t_unit_report.id ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1
